main.name: KR Baidik
main.description: Crafting Digital Dreams: Where Innovation Meets Imagination.
main.bio: I am a skilled Laravel developer with 4 years of hands-on experience in PHP web development. Specializing in Laravel, I have successfully delivered numerous projects that showcase my proficiency in backend development, RESTful API integration, and database management. With a strong focus on performance optimization and user-centric design, I am committed to leveraging Laravel's powerful capabilities to create robust and scalable web applications. Continuously learning and adapting to new technologies, I am passionate about delivering high-quality solutions that exceed client expectations and contribute to organizational success.

resume.skillmessage: Experienced Laravel developer with 4 years of PHP web development expertise. Skilled in building robust backend solutions, RESTful APIs, and optimizing performance. Strong problem-solving skills, committed to quality and continuous learning.

education.school: Nagarjuna College of Information Technology - Kathmandu, Nepal
Mukti Higher Secondary School Pyuthan, Nepal
education.degree: +2 in Science - Higher Secondary Education Board

education.school: Bhuwaneshwori Higher secondary School - Pyuthan, Nepal

description.text: Managed project and web strategic planning for entire team.
Collaborated with designers to implement concept and design of website.
Integrated payment processing features onto Education Management System.
Tested and integrated different sms api’s.

Optimized task scheduling to minimize resource consumption
and ensure efficient utilization of server resources

Developed strong communication and organizational skills
through working on group projects.

Managed time efficiently in order to complete all tasks
within deadlines.
Work with developers to design algorithms and flowcharts.

Proficient in handling REST API, Eloquent ORM, and AJAX
requests.

Contributed to back-end experience and collaborated on
APIs.

projects.title: Easy Health Management System
projects.details: EHIMS is a system that monitors the performance of Health Institution.

projects.title: emedicareSoft: A Complete Health Information Management
projects.details: emedicareSoft is a complete digital health information management system that provides hospitals and other healthcare facilities with all-in-one solutions.

projects.title: Education Management System (Allstar EMS)
projects.details:
An education management system improves both administrative processes and relations between students and teachers.
Having a good education management system can ensure more organization in a school’s day-to-day of the school, optimizing the performance of managers and even the quality of education.
